评论详情: This pullover is soft, very comfortable to wear, and fits beautifully. The color is gorgeous and makes a perfect top to wear outdoors with sun protection for those who wish to protect themselves from the sun. I can wear this pullover when I garden and walk outside in summer or winter. I love this pullover and highly recommend the product for looks, sun protection, and long wearability.

Unlike so many women's tops today, this top is cut to fit the female form. It has room for an ample bust line without being super baggy everywhere else. The length goes to the hipline, which I like. It is pretty well-made. It could use some better finishing touches around the collar if you plan to use it in a dressy setting, otherwise it is fine for every day. It launders really well, too.
Great color- getting compliments. Pleased with fit & overall quality. Zippered pockets are nice

Being older and suffering from skin problems I have started wearing protective shirts like these.  I find them very cool even in the warmest summer temperatures and they protect against skin damage caused by the sun’s rays.  This brand suits me; colors are bright and style is very complementary for most body types.  Quality is excellent (well sewn/nice zipper).  My only wish is that they make these in petite sizes.  They’re a little too long, especially in sleeves, for me.
I like the versatile zip up collar, the fabric is lightweight which is what I wanted.  A bit pricey, but I couldn't find this type with the collar at my usual clothing store.

I really like this shirt. I live in hot, humid SW Florida, and I have easily damaged skin. I’ve been looking for nice-fitting, comfortable, long-sleeved shirts to protect my skin on my twice daily walks and when I go to the beach, and this, for me, is tge best one I’ve found this year. Most long-sleeved tops are too hot. I worried about this one when I first got it. But it looks great, fits well, and is surprisingly comfortable, even on hot humid days. It washes well, too. I air-dry most of my clothes, so I can’t tell you if it is safe in the dryer. I am very pleased with this shirt.

评论概述: Lightweight Top but neck is very wide. Not really a turtle neck
评论详情: I generally take a small (5'9" 120 lbs) but this felt very large on me. Sleeves were the right length but the overall length was quite long even for a tall person like myself. I had hoped to use this to layer in winter sports but it was quite thin not adding any warmth. Even with all of that I might have kept it but the turtle neck was ridiculously wide--very large. I will have to return this.
I like the material and fit of this shirt.  Also the curved or shirttail hem is more flattering for me.  It was true to size also.
I have this top in 3 patterns now and love them all for tennis, just running errands or just hanging out!  Very comfortable and wash and dry well.
Like the fit.  It is a bit tapered at the bottom.  Fabric is a nice weight.

评论概述: Love these tops! Bought them for all my sisters
评论详情: These are great tops for working out or just wearing.  All the different designs provide many options.  I personally own three and gave 5 as gifts for my sisters.  They all loved them.

The fabric was of decent weight and the fit was good given the S,M,L choices.  I didn’t like the large circumference of the neck band.  I wanted something that hugged my neck more and stood up nicely.  I would buy several if the neck band/collar fit better.  If you’re going to wear it not zipped all the way and the collar turned down as in the picture, I would definitely recommend these tops.

评论概述: Flattering, lightweight top for any activity
评论详情: This top strikes that balance between athletic wear and classy.  I wore it for a pickleball event at work and felt good in it.  It is shaped to still give you a waist, perfect if you have a bit of an hourglass figure, and it doesn't show sweat marks if you're working hard.  For the cooler months, it's great for walks and runs.  I would not wear anything under it - it's pretty thin and not baggy, so I thin layering under it would be uncomfortable.  However, popping a vest over it would be a nice look, if you need some extra warmth.
Quality looks great .  Color looks more like a denim, and I expected a brighter blue, but it is nice.

评论概述: Fits close, long in torso and arms
评论详情: Long Review. Hopefully this is helpful if you're on the fence.  I'm 5'9, 175-185 lbs range. My figure is overly very shapely with an hour glass figure. Most of my weight is in the butt, hip & thigh area. I have a small waist, 36D bust, long arms (with bat wings!) & long torso.  I have bought every one of these shirts. They are so pretty. I use cold water delicate cycle. No need to put in dryer as the material dries super quick. I put on a hanger to dry.  Things to know before buying:  The shirt fits close so don't expect a flare at the bottom. It DOES cling. . Muffin top will show.  "Spill over" in your front bra area will show, again because the shirt is thin material and clings close. Also if you have a lot of "spill over", back/side "fat" around bra line, it will show. If you don't already know, this type of "fat" is actually breast tissue & usually is a result of a poorly fitted bra. (So is "spill over") Buy a bra that has higher side material and fits correctly. Cup size is usually the issue. I wear an unpadded bra with a fitted cami to keep those nips from showing.  So, like I said, I have many problem areas in my hips, thigh and butt. For me, this shirt gives a long lean look and easily covers the butt! I can bend over with no ride up.  I wear this to work when I feel like wearing something other than a scrub top. For me the only downside is No Pockets. But I like this shirt so much that it's worth it.  After I received the blue one. I ordered the red. I get sooo many compliments everytime that I ordered every color!!  Obviously no clothing item a miracle worker. Ya gotta work with what you have. I'm glad I took a chance to get this shirt!
Love this pullover. Just wish they had pockets.
Very attractive and fits well.  Not quite as cool as the ones with the mesh down the sleeves and the material is not quite as cool feeling or soft.  However, it does the job and looks very nice.
